item.description:
Hi my friends!

We've been getting together this fall through my meet-up, Go Yoga! Go Life!. As a sponsor of Fun Stuff, Etc. I am posting here so everyone has easy access.

Here is the invitation:

Please join me in my home to practice gentle yoga together. If you are new to yoga, let me assure you that we will take it very easy. I will bring you through a warm-up, some standing poses and relaxation. Yoga is for everyone so enjoy it and always go at your own pace!

Please bring a yoga mat and sitting pillow and any other props you have.
I have a few mats so if you prefer to use mine, I will be delighted!

Remember - your first class is FREE!

Thanks so much!

Namaste,
Tobi

..
item.name: Gentle Yoga - Tobi's house
